question: Jalees Sherwani, who passed away recently, was the veteran personality from which field?
explanation: Jalees Sherwani (70), the veteran screenplay writer, has passed away in Mumbai. Maharashtra on August 1, 2018. He had penned lyrics for several Salman Khan films like \"Dabangg\", \"Wanted\" and \"Tere Naam\". Apart from writing dialogues for \"Sangam\" and \"Loafer\", Sherwani also penned lyrics for films like \"Partner\", \"Hello\", \"Garv\" and \"Hello Brother\".
